title: Manage a Multiple Offer Situation
description: A seller has received three offers on their property. The agent must organize the offers and present them to the seller.

tasks.description: Receive and log all three offers, noting the price, terms, and contingencies of each.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the key details of each offer.

tasks.description: Create a comparison spreadsheet or summary sheet to easily compare the offers side-by-side.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a clear, easy-to-understand comparison for the seller.

tasks.description: Advise the seller on the strengths and weaknesses of each offer and help them decide whether to accept one or send out multiple counter-offers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides strategic advice to help the seller navigate the situation.
